name: Roli
description:
This is my submission for the A2B2 Game Jam for Charity 2022

Story:

Laputa, a little island commune of ecosocialist rebels, artists, and scientists - created a robot to safeguard their crystal batteries.

 They named the robot Roli.

The nation of Patrios has stolen the crystal batteries and is using them to power their global supply line. Patrios empire is consuming the environment and destroying the world. 

Knowing that the crystal batteries have been corrupted; Roli is given the task of finding them, and destroying them.
